description: Enterprise techniques used by Naid, ATT&CK software S0205 v1.0
name: Naid (S0205)

techniques.comment: [Naid](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0205) creates a new service to establish.(Citation: Symantec Naid June 2012)

[Naid](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0205) creates Registry entries that store information about a created service and point to a malicious DLL dropped to disk.(Citation: Symantec Naid June 2012)
[Naid](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0205) collects a unique identifier (UID) from a compromised host.(Citation: Symantec Naid June 2012)
[Naid](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0205) collects the domain name from a compromised host.(Citation: Symantec Naid June 2012)
